Articles.Content:
So I don't want to take the time to reproduce this in a stock game. Hoping someone else knows of this or can reproduce.

The RoveMax Model XL3 wheels have a very interesting behavior in my game. They appear to be able to drive a vehicle much faster than the motor max speed suggests while turning and going forward. I was able to make a runway dragster hit 150  m/s on EC alone! I did this simply by holding forward and alternating turn keys. I suspect that turning and going forward glitches to make the motor produce way more power than 100%.
